text: do you need to add crossorigin to any of your script tags?

The script that gets the CORS error (only when uBlock Origin is enabled, for me) is a HubSpot-served script; I think it’s one that’s automatically bundled when CTAs are added to the page. I don’t imagine that a HubSpot script would get a genuine CORS error when served on a HubSpot CMS site.

As a follow-up, I now see those page elements just fine even when uBlock Origin is enabled. I’m guessing OP figured out a fix!
